author: Techlore
description:
Apple is fighting back and taking legal actions to appeal the UK encryption backdoor. While Apple pulled ADP, their end to end encryption, they are legally appealing this. Let's cover what's happening, some possible outcomes, and what we can do to move the needle for the future of security & privacy.

title: Breaking: Apple Battles the UK Encryption Backdoor
